name: Redbox Mobile
description:
Redbox Mobile, with offices in Berkshire, London and New York, provides mobile focused marketing solutions to brands and app owners. Specializing in App Store Optimization (ASO), we to help increase the discoverability of an app across all app stores and countries – increasing the number of downloads and user engagement by attracting the ‘right’ users.
Our goal is to solve the problem of app discovery within app stores, we offer a service that not only ensures your app reaches the top 10 rankings in the App Store search, but also receives an increase in downloads and revenue.  We work with some of the world's most valuable brands. We are delighted to include Vodafone, BBC, Tesco, Virgin, Universal and WSJ amongst our list of clients and we truly enjoy working with these amazing companies.
